Beddings were warm and comfortable. Room was equipped with TV, radio, Kettle, Coffee maker, dvd player and a tv with so many channels. 
Ample towels and toiletries were provided which many other B&B don't usually provide enough.
Owners were very generous with the breakfast servings. Alphons was very helpful in helping us with directions in the area as well as places to visit.
The only little problem was to us since we don't travel light and the room is 2 floors up...

title: Our best holiday to date
comment:
We spent 5days touring Sri Lanka and 7 days at the Club Hotel Dolphin in what can only be described as our best holiday to dat. My husaband and i travelled with our 2 adult children and their partner and the holiday was all we could have hoped for with beautiful surroundings, attentive but not intrusive staff and excellent food. The rooms were excellent and the standard of cleanliness impeccable. The kids room were on the beach although ours was set further back and a little hemmed in but as we weren't in the room for long it wasn't a problem. We were evacuated due to a tsunami warning, during our stay and the staff dealt with the situation calmly and professionally at all times. we were kept informed and supplied with food and drink until we were able to return to the hotel.
A wonderful holiday

title: Dana Beach Resort - great!
comment:
What can we say.
The hotel is very very very very very very very excellent.
No bad comments at all.

The Italian coffecorner Columbus is great. also the service of the staff is excellent.

We will come back for sure

title: Top hotel. This year for the 4 time
comment:
we are staying in this hotel for a few years now.
Every time is a wonderfull holiday
In April we will be back for a very sunny relaxing week
Personal is very friendly en work very hard to please the people

title: Love this resort!
comment: All in all everything was very good. I can't really complain about anything. Everything was excellent and I'd like to visit this resort again! The staff is very friendly and always ready to help, with some of them it is a little difficult to talk, but it's okay. I think this is my new favorite place to go on vacation, everything is perfect.

title: Wonderful time
comment: We were traveling with our friend- 4 couples. Had a very good time,nothing to complain except disco music needs to be adjusted, when we went to disco there was just our group no more people and we ask DJ to play some music from 80-90th and he plays only Bob Marley and some other music which is imposible to dance. We noticed that Disco was always empty, so change the music or DJ. Liked a lot the dancers, but when guests entertain guest with stupid dansing and running around to take shoes and pants from the audience is stupid and borring. Maybe some people like this. Rooms, food wonderful. Beaches(3) are small and have rocks(we had the water shoes), if you come early at the beach don't expect towels until 8.30-9.00 am. Overal resort is good. I would go back but bring my own music for disco :)

title: Just great
comment:
It was an awesome time with great animaters - espaccely Emily Amel - we miss you ;-) we had so much fun in this hotel... 
I just can recommend this hotel to everybody and you should eat at the Asian-Restaurant... thats just a dream...

thank you for this great time - I will come back for sure...

title: Disappointed experience
comment: Similar to all Steigenburger hotels of which I stayed, the hotel was clean and the staff professional. Advised breakfast was included when I reseved the room from the airport Welcome Center , however since I reserved the room "from the airport" it was not, according to the desk clerk the next morning.

title: Friendly, helpful hosts
comment: Our hosts were friendly and very helpful. Everything was wonderfully clean and  the en-suite bathroom was ingeniously placed. A wonderful range of food for breakfast and we were offered scrambled egg on toast - after 3 weeks in france on bread and jam this was a feast to behold. On Sunday morning we saw the ladies going to church in traditional dress which was wonderful to see.

title: Dana Beach 2013
comment:
It was the second time at Dana Beach and we were pleases that the childrens swimmingpool was also heated now. Last year it wasn't. and due to the weather it was to cold for the children to use that pool;

We will come back to Dana Beach.

title: Dana Beach Resort - the place to stay in Hurghada
comment: Nice, spacious and yet compact hotel area with all the things you want for a beach holiday inside the hotel area. Lots of restaurants to choose from, friendly and humorous staff, good facilities and some activities and peace and quiet for those who want that. Mostly german guests + 50 years old. Some families with children also. Not a partyplace in a good sence. A nightclub right across the street.

title: Surprising good stay!
comment:
I stayed in a redecorated and refurnished room. That was a surprise. Had a very good stay for two nights. Restaurant was ok, although that atmosphere did not match the new room. But maybe the next stay that area will be done as well. 
Be sure to ask for a new room!

title: Nice hotel, excellent cuisine
comment: Nice and clean hotel. First day when we arrived  the toilet wasnt clean. Second day was toilet cleaned and rest of our stay we had no problem with this. Breakfast  is very good, dinner is excellent. We stayed six night in this hotel, and we were very safisfied. We really enjoyed our stay.

title: The perfect resort for the perfect holiday
comment: It was a perfect choice for wonderful holidays! The service was marvellous! The staff's foreign languages and general competences were excellent. The hotel offered great leisure activities. THE BEST ANIMATIONS which I`ve ever seen - especially water gym with Sasha and kuku !!! This man is amazing - very funny and friendly for hotel guests. I`ll come back here next year!

title: Great overall vacation - part of wedding party
comment: The hotel itself is beautiful. Very spacious and comfortable rooms. The villas are nicely laid out across the expansive grounds. Its basically a luxury cruise ship concept but on land. The grounds are very extensive and so the walking can be far from the main buildings. However its a good daily exercise.

title: Just good place for business
comment: There are good conference rooms with all necessary infrastructure, good location allowing you to have nice evening, pool, restaurants, internet, 5 minutes to airport - everything you need to do a business and relax after that. Interior is superb as well as rooms.

title: Cheap, but miserable
comment: I requested a non-smoking room, only to find a cigarette in the toilet.  After calling reception, they offered me an upgrade.  This however requires walking all around the hotel, and there is only one set of elevators for each floor (the hotel is a pyramid, and the elevators are only in one corner).  The food was expensive.  And my salad was a dressing soup topped with some lettuce.

title: Great and restful place to stay.
comment: It was our first night in a foreign country and you made us feel like we were at home. The breakfast and service you provided the next day was exceptional. The staff made us feel very welcome from the time we checked in ...to our departure. Thank you.

title: Everything ok
comment: For you exspectations and use everything was ok. Very near to the beach. Good room and climation. No balcony, only italien tv no german no english. the parking situation is a little chaos, but we always find a place. the service at breakfast is bad and there are only a few things to eat. very loud at the weekends because of event outside.

title: Dana Beach - a bit of heaven on earth.
comment: My husband and I have been staying at the Dana Beach for nearly 6 years sometimes on our own and sometimes with our family who also visit alone. We have sometimes stayed more than once a year so I'm sure that says it all. There is absolutely nothing to dislike about the hotel. It is spotlessly clean, food is excellent and staff are all really friendly. It is a shame more British people don't visit but this is not a problem - they really don't know what they are missing. We will be returning December 14th and staying until January 11th and can't wait. We have made so many friends there it is like visiting family.

title: Relaxing & friendly!
comment: Although the hotel was under renovation during my visit, It was friendly & comfortable. I am looking forward to be back in Dec. After the renovation is completed beginning  of Nov. Excellent spot for a brilliant holiday

title: A great location
comment: We stayed in a beach villa overlooking the sea (number 50) it was in a beautiful position, was very clean and well furbished. The area in front of our villa was used for the several marriage ceremonies we witnessed from our porch during our stay. The grounds around our villa were maintained to a very high standard as was the reception area and also the dining area. Our villa was positioned towards the quiet pool area of the complex and i feel i can only comment on this area as we did not visit the large pool where the animators conducted games of various kinds. We are in our sixties and wanted a quiet holiday, which is exactly what we got.

title: The best holiday ever, we will be back again
comment: Dana is the best and we will be back again and again. This year we have been staying at Dana 2 times. Last year 2 times , the year before 2 times........ We have had friends who have been at Dana morew than once

title: Basic hotel outside the Amsterdam
comment:
Quite OK hotel next to Amsterdam.Major advantage is free parking and subway station within 8 mins walk. 
There is nothing but highway close to hotel. In 5 minutes drive you can find McDonalds.
Very well conected to Amsterdam city center - 8 min walk + 25 mins subway

title: Great Hotel!
comment: We had a great one night stay at the hotel. Big pluss is the huge park in connection to the hotel. Our one year old son loved to run around there and there was a big playground in the park only a couple of hundred meters from the hotel. I would most certainly recommend this hotel!!

title: A fantastic weekend break at the sea
comment: A beautiful beach hotel, less than an hour from Thessaloniki, with fantastic sea view and one of the best beaches (organized - blue flag) I ever visited, ideal for a weekend break or a long summer holiday. There are many things to do (water sports, mountain excursions etc). My kids were very enthusiastic with the pool (there are two) and the lift that takes you from pool level to the beach and vice versa. The personnel is very friendly, there were many facilities (beach bar, restaurant, mini market, cafe) and the service was at  a high level.  I strongly recommend it.

title: Excellent holiday and excellent staff
comment:
This was our fourth trip to Egypt and first to this Hotel. We were not disappointed as our travel ágent had made a mistake with our booking and the hotel manager sorted it for us efficiently. The staff were wonderful and could not have been more welcoming or helpful. Mainly Russian tourists and guests with some Germans thrown in but would most definitely return to this hotel in the future as could not fault anything. The food, variety of, and the offer to dine anywhere in any of seven or so different dining rooms in the resort was a bonus.
Definitely worth the money and really enjoyed our stay, well done to all the staff we met.

title: The most enjoyable vacation for me and family
comment:
It's one of the best holidays we ever had in hurghada. We decided to visit Dana beach resort again in our next holiday.
Thanks to the friendly stuff, excellent management, it was the best holiday

title: Best holiday in hotel Topaz Club
comment: In our 14 days stay in all inclusive vas great.Incredible size of the suite, clean and very luxury.Food is good,nice coktails.Staff is wery friendly,especialy animation team and manager Mohamed,he ensures that everything you need is there.Thank you all.We enjoyed it.

title: Best holidays ever!
comment:
Everything was excellent.  We enjoyed the time on the beach and the friendliness of the people working there.  
Fantastic food, breathtaken view from the bar.  Great music and moments that we will always remember.
See you next year.

title: Nice winter city trip in Köln
comment: We enjoyed a very nice weekend break in the Köln Dorint. Thanks to the special weekend rates during january we decided to make this extra winter city trip. Köln is really worth visiting, and the Dorint a very comfortable place to stay. It only was a pity that the underground parking did cost us exact 50% of the room rate. But the rooms were indeed very comfortable and the food excellent !

title: Excellent
comment: Really excelent hotel, clean and beautiful room, comprehensive choice of delicious food and drinks in different restaurant, beach near the hotel, very nice people (animators, waiters, cooks, receptionist, cleaning men...), great animations program - step aerobic, oriental dance and specially water gym:-) and at night disco. I of course recommend Dana Beach!

title: Really a nice and modern hotel
comment: This is a nice hotel, very well located in the town of Ness. It is modern and the room had a coffee/tea machine for your own free coffee or tea! This was really appreciated by us. The staff was very helpfull and friendly. The bathroom was a little small, but clean. Good size tv!!! They serve a really nice  breakfast. This hotel offers good value for money!!! The only missing thing was a hotel lounge where you can sit and relax or read a paper.

title: Coming to rest
comment: Friendly, clean hotel, with good sound isolation, so in general no noise from outside the room!!!! The wellness is an absolute pluspoint, tram to the centre of cologne stops right in front. There's underground parking but expensive. I've been coming to this hotel since 2000 and still returning. The new management is a definete improvement

title: A little piece of heaven
comment:
A nice hotel in a good place... At 2 steps from downtown! Breakfast is wonderful! Vital Spa is nice but interesting because accessible from 7 am to 11 pm!
Koln contains a lot of shopping and church!

title: Best hotel in Frankfurt
comment:
Always is one of the best hotel I ever use.
last 2 years the day I decide to visit Frankfurt, I make sure that I will have a nice journey in Steigenberger Hotel.
Even in Hamburg, Steigenberger hotel is Waww.

title: Location of the hotel and dinner excellent
comment:
-small rooms but a big balcony in rooms with seasight
-breakfeast( buffet) is good, dinner is excellent
-bathroom small, but clean
-matras familyroom was hard and bad in the single room
-Dutch; 42, 66 and 67 years
-wifi is free

title: Dog friendly
comment: We was there with two dogs, fine areas to take the dogs out for walk and dogs very welcome, even in the restaurant. Short drive to Amsterdam RAI. Quietly place and god parking areas . Staff very helpful.

title: Great resort
comment: the hotel is very clean and all the people who are working their are very friendly and willing to help. The food in general is very very good also the rooms

title: A wonderful stay!
comment: Martha and Alphons are fantastic hosts. They are very friendly and knowledgeable about Spakenburg and the surrounding area. The rooms were neat, very clean, wonderfully decorated and comfortable. The breakfast was delicious and everything was offered - cheese, fruit, breads, juice, coffee, tea and chocolate sprinkles (my personal favourite). The location is in a nice, safe, quiet street close to a supermarket and the bus stop. Good quality bikes were available to hire to get you into the town centre quickly. I will definitely be returning on my next trip to Holland!

title: My impressions are generally very good and I feel
comment: very good according the price..excellent sea.very friendly people. i  would like to be again in that place. i will not forget the smilling faces of the emploeys of the hotel  and how helpfull they were>

title: Frankfurt's finest!
comment: The Frankfurter Hof is surrounded by some of Europe's most impressive skyscrapers. The building itself is only a few stories tall, but still it manages to impress with it's classical palace-like architecture. The main entrance is a small letdown. One would expect to enter the building through the front gate. Instead, the entrance is a small door on the side of the building. Once inside, the elegance and atmosphere of the lobby will quickly remind you why you chose this hotel.

title: Hotel Tornese ever!
comment:
I am a customer of this hotel for over 10 years, but I have never experienced such a miserable service this year.
For years we enmenons friends and family with us, but this is the last time!
The hotel Tornese lost regular customers!

title: Melia Grand Hermitage...hard to leave it!
comment: That's for sure:  I'LL BE BACK !!!!!  Everything was unexpected in the good way as possible! I got 5 days of maximum relax time. I'm from Romania, i love my country , but the bulgarians are better than us at tourism! Congratulations !!!

title: Good for bed and breakfast
comment: Only there for one night so cannot comment on longer stays but usual expected features but possible tired for a hotel with higher expectations. We paid a last minute price thus was 'cheap' for this hotel and extremely reasonable compared to other places we had stayed in Tuscany. Had we paid the full price we would have been disappointed as no way worth the usual 130 euros for a small double room.

title: My favourite hotel in Cologne
comment:
excellent value for money, good breakfast and excellent wellness facilities.
Though not in the centre the public transport system stops right in front of the hotel and brings u in a minimum of time to the centre thus avoiding parking problems and the like.
Have been a frequent visitor to this hotel since 2000

title: A brilliant oasis in a desert wilderness
comment: What a terrific hotel resort, fantastically clean when one thinks of 700 rooms but always lots of space, the pools and the beach were constantly cleaned and manicured and sun beds were more than enough for everyone, with pool and beach towels always available. We stayed on an all inclysive service and we could not fault the food or drink in any of the hotels restaurants or bars and the waiter service was totally five star. The main nationalities were German and Swiss and afew of us Brits, but no problems there everyone got on really well.

title: Friendly, helpful hosts
comment: Our hosts were friendly and very helpful. Everything was wonderfully clean and  the en-suite bathroom was ingeniously placed. A wonderful range of food for breakfast and we were offered scrambled egg on toast - after 3 weeks in france on bread and jam this was a feast to behold. On Sunday morning we saw the ladies going to church in traditional dress which was wonderful to see.

title: For the 2nd time a fantastically stay
comment: A big hotel (about 700 rooms?) and a slendid garden  and in some swimmingpool warm water. They keep in repair very well; they were painting now the balcony and in the passed yaer they had made new foot-paths. The rooms are very clean. Many people are also working in the garden and the water in the lagune and pond get cleaned the whole day. There are a few couple from the Netherlands; most people came from Germany.

title: Wonderful facility, but...
comment: Hotel was great with a superb staff, room and restaurants.  We chose the hotel for relaxation before our journey home.  The SKY (spa) was a disappointment - not due to facility.  The sauna/steam room area was constantly invaded by families and singles in swim wear, including children with goggle and floaties - with no spa etiquette.  The staff did an excellent job of keeping unaccompanied children out of pool and work out area.  However, the sauna/steam room area was  not managed as well.  I suggest the staff tell quests proper etiquette and dress for use of those facilities as well as additional signage so guests like us can enjoy the excellent  facilities.

title: Dorint hotel
comment: Will defiantly return to this hotel, staff where lovely, the lobby was welcoming hotel was in great condition and the rooms very comfortable, Köln city centre is only a short scenic walk from room

title: A very good all inclusive hotel
comment: We did not have any higher expectations at all when we arrived to the hotel. Once we stepped into the hotel lobby everything changed. The area looked very luxurous and spacy. The hotel room was top class. We highly recommend this hotel. Ann/Lelle

title: You might be pleasantly surprised
comment:
Our room was very clean as was the whole hotel. Food was good always a very good choice in each restaurant. There are  5 restaurants and they are all very good. Food was always hot too. Neither of us suffered with delly belly!
Staff were friendly and helpful. The beach was always busy and had to get there early to get a sunbed. 
. 
I had massages in the health Club that is near the gym. I would advise to have treatments at the hotel health Club as this is better and more professional.
We did a few diving trips and a trip to Mahmya Island.

title: Inclusive or 'All inclusive' that is the question?
comment:
Lovely and clean, nice rooms, nice location.
Paaid for All inclusive but this was not exactly what I received, for this I had to pay 'extra', All inclusive to this hotel is meals in the main self sevice restaurant, does not include any other restaurant on the site, the local fish market evening was extra as well as the ala carte, they do give you a RS375 off the ala carte menu which is an insult due to the price charged for self service. There is no wine included in the All inclusive, not even with meals, this has to be paid extra, no liquires. You can pay exrra for these by paying for a 'gold all inclusive' package

title: Swiming swans in the pond and park view from lobby
comment: A pleasant location where you can just walk around the pond and be cared for in a very hospitable way in the hotel. The food and variety is great with a friendly staff. Well worth the money and time spent.

title: Very good and nice hotel. Very friendly personal.
comment:
We are surely coming back to this very good hotel. Everything was great. Very very good. Food and drinks were great.
There was nothing that we did not like at this hotel. Swimmingpools enough!!!

title: Melia is the best hotel in Bulgaria!
comment:
This is oyr 10th time in Bulgaria but for sure the best one! Melia is the best hotel! The biggest room in Bulgaria with lovely sea view. Already booked our next visit in 2013. We recommend it to everybody!
The staff was very friendly, the beach is 2 minutes walking and the sea is great!
The food was good as well, though the waiters were a bit tired.
Everybody speaks Russian and it is very easy to get informed if you need something.
Thank you, Melia! Will come back for sure!

title: Very nice hotel, very nice room with maisonette
comment: breakfast quite expensive but overall very nice hotel, very clean and modern. I would recommend this hotel both for business as for pleaseure / family visit of Cologne. Very good parking possibilties.

title: Great hotel, kind personnel, delicious food
comment:
We got a two-day trip to this hotel for our wedding, so we didn't choose it ourselves. We're glad though that our friends picked this hotel. It's a very warm and comfy hotel which makes you feel at home right away. Our room was small but sufficient. It was definitely clean which is most important to us. The bathroom was pretty new and also absolutely clean. 
We enjoyed breakfast and one dinner at the hotel and it was both great. We had a 4-month-old baby with us and the personnel was very keen to find a good table for us and the stroller. 
There is a small Park right next to the hotel which is nice to take a walk. The center of Trier is just a 10-15 minute drive away. 
All in all we enjoyed the hotel very much and can recommend it.

title: Great holiday!
comment:
Our holiday was very nice. We had a week in Melia Hotel and enjoyed it. We booked a room with sea view and the view was really amasing.
The food was good, the staff was really helpfull and friendly, we felt very good as everywhere everybody was always there to give us information or help.
The price of the room was very reasonable as well and we will book again now with the early discounts definitely.
Try the sea view room and the Bulgarian night with bulgarian food and drinks, it's very delicious!

title: A wonderful stay!
comment: Martha and Alphons are fantastic hosts. They are very friendly and knowledgeable about Spakenburg and the surrounding area. The rooms were neat, very clean, wonderfully decorated and comfortable. The breakfast was delicious and everything was offered - cheese, fruit, breads, juice, coffee, tea and chocolate sprinkles (my personal favourite). The location is in a nice, safe, quiet street close to a supermarket and the bus stop. Good quality bikes were available to hire to get you into the town centre quickly. I will definitely be returning on my next trip to Holland!

title: Best hotel in Hurghada
comment: first class service in every department from cleaners to waiters and service desk at reception ,booked a double room with wife and grandaughter and was given a free upgrade to a junior suite, what more can i say excellent food and drinks plenty sunbeds at pools and beach

title: Such a lovely hotel, everything was excellent
comment: the hotel rooms were excellent and the bathrooms were large, very clean, the food had such a variety. I am british and I went with my friends (4) and the ages ranged from 35 to 65

title: City Break
comment: In this day and age to charge Euro 20.00 for Wi-Fi a day is silly - low band should be free in your room. This is generally pitched as a business hotel, in a business area and therefore should be inclusive.

title: The red square in Moscow
comment:
Hurghada is generally speaking a good place for a few days of relax, the beach is not so good.The Hotel is nice,but if you don't like the worst Russians all together, that is not the place you want to go.Avoid the buffet,the food is poor, the best restaurant is the turkish, try to make a reservation. Animation is great, especially the cool Riko, that at least speaks english,otherwise prepare yourself to an intensive Russian speaking course.
The staff is very good, with some exceptions. 
One big minus, prepare yourself to very persistent shop workers that bother you all the time trying to sell you all kind of things.

title: Thoroughly enjoyable holiday
comment: From arriving at the hotel the staff couldn't do enough for us. The bungalow was excellent, the pool guys always helped and were very pleasant. The waiters were friendly, pleasant and helpful. The a la carte restaurant and the fish restaurant were excellent and good value. We have travelled all over the world and rate this as one of the best holidays. My husband became disabled in recent years and the help we received from the staff made it a holiday we could relax and enjoy without any stress to myself. The only down side was the dress code in the restaurants as in a hotel of this quality we would expect an evening dress code e.g long trousers for men and no beach wear.

title: Review Koeln Dorint an der Messe
comment: We had an affordable upgrade to a maisonette. Great choice. Quiet, large, feeling of luxury. Nice sauna area. Staff at reception and breakfast was excellent± helpful, friendly and polite. We will certainly come back next year when we have another event at Lanxess Arena

title: Topaz Club- worth a visit
comment: I can recommend this hotel, romms are big and clean,friendly animation team, every evening show time so we werent bored, every night disco, food was really good and fresh and what was nice also-u can reserve a dinner in themed restaurant, i recommend especially italian

title: Beach & cricket
comment: We had a very enjoyable stay at the hotel. We were with a small group who came to watch the Test Match in Colombo. The drive to the ground was a lengthy 2 hours each morning as the roads are very gridlocked. The Hotel and Staff were very welcoming. The food was international hotel food, buffet style and was excellent. I would recommend this for someone wanting a relaxing time.

title: Go for Steigenberger Frankfurtter Hof!
comment:
The Steigenberger Frankfurtter Hof is a great place to stay in Frankfurt. Location is absolutely top - going shopping or doing business. The service is really top of the line, and rooms are renovated in a very classy, but modern style.
I would rank this one among the top five of visits - ever!

title: Nice hotel with good access to the city and Messe
comment: Dorint an der Messe is a fine hotel for businesstrips and a city break. Within 7 minutes you are in the centre of Koln Altstadt. Here you can have a good shoppingday or visit one or another museum and ofcourse the Dom. Try the apfelstrudl at Cafe Reichards,

title: Topaz hotel for a wonderful holiday in Hurghada
comment:
A confortable hotel , large rooms and excellent service. Mr. Hussein, the hotelmanager want the guests to enjoy e wonderful holiday in the hotel.The staff is very friendly, they speak English and some of them speak Dutch as well.
The animation team makes you feel happy during your stay. Ervery morning Aquagym! We enjoyed  te meals. 

A wonderful hotel for a good price.
Tina

title: An excellent place to stay with friendly hosts.
comment:
Alphons & Martha are excellent hosts, most accommodating & helpful finding our way and with use of their facilities over and above expectations, without being intrusive. Breakfast was super. This would be our first recommendation for a quiet stay close to the city! 

Gerrit & Connie

B.C. Canada

title: Nice hotel with good wellness facilities
comment: Very nice hotel with good wellness facilities.  the hotel is just a 15min walk from the city center.  Don't want to walk?  The tram stops just in front of the hotel.  If you come by car, there is a car-park underneath the hotel

title: Nice hotel in the centre of Nes.
comment: Nice accomodation with a really great breakfast. It is really close to the centre of Nes and you are within minutes at the beach with the bike. The rooms were a lot smaller than expected and the bathroom had mold between some tiles, so that's why we rated that part lower.

title: Beautiful surroundings, nice beach, friendly staff
comment: Unfortunately, I do not so much speak English, to comment and to review the hotel without errors. Overall, I liked the rest. One note - I would like a more fun evening at the hotel. I would also like to in the rooms was free water

title: Hotel Riverside
comment:
The hotel was underconstruction therefore there were problems with the heating. The breakfast  and diner aerea was freezing!
No actions were taken to get us any warmer.
My old room was very old and I hope that the new rooms will be of this time

title: Weihnacht markt weekend
comment:
i was there wiht my wife and brother and his wife , we stay there for 1 night
and it was great and nice good people in the hotel and very friendly and helpfull
and the weihnacht markt was very nice like always!!! very good hotel!!

title: Great all inclusive trip!
comment: My family went to Jamaica on a last minute trip.  The Grand Palladium Lady Hamilton Resort was recommended to us.  The resort is absolutely beautiful.  The food is great - especially Bubba's Steakhouse (ate there twice).  The service was excellent.  The pool bartenders were extremely pleasant and always attentive of our needs.  They knew what we wanted to drink as we approached the bar.  It was an excellent time had by all and I would highly recommend this resort to my family and friends.

title: Don't go there, the only nice thing is the beach
comment: I would never ever come back to this hotel even if they paid me. simply it's not worth the money, let alone the 4 stars. There are not enough seats for the guests in the restaurant, so for dinner you have to wait in a queue

title: Many nice changes since my last stay
comment:
It was my second Stay at this wonderful hotel and it was just great. In the few months a lot has been completed and beautified.
The beautifully landscaped grounds, the new children's playground, just about everything last year was not yet finished. It has been created from a very pleasant grounds a wonderful facility.
What is also noticed very positive: There were not many Russians in this hotel. During my time 60% German, Dutch and Italians of the rest.
Unfortunately, I can only give the maximum number of 6 points, this hotel has earned it in some areas, but the score 8 !!!!!

title: Egypts best hotel at Hurghada, Dana Beach!
comment:
Great and clean rooms, good food, nice staff so our conclusion about this hotel is that's a super, fantastic place to go to and we would like to recomend and invite everybody to book their vacationPickalbatros Dana Beach.
I know we will go back  that's for sure!
Keep on going with te good work!

title: Great Atmosphere & varieties of foods!
comment:
I have experienced in Linen change in the bath room of Villa which i staid, since the linen are not fresh on my entry to the room. Thereafter, i have call up the room service & got it changed.

Other than the aforesaid, i have nothing to complain about Club Dolphin during my several visits. 

Keep up di good work.

Prashanth

title: Steigenberger Airport Hotel Frankfurt
comment:
The staff is very friendly, prompt and courteous.
Check-in/ Check-out was a piece of cake.
I got an upgrade to Executive suite at no cost.
Outbeaten cleanliness noticed from lobby to room.
I was impressed with the breakfast selection.

title: Good choise, tasteful meals and  clean rooms
comment: Good and clean hotel. The food was good and varieous. There were 4 restaurants, so you can choose where to dine or lunch. Rooms were very clean. Beautifull gardens and swimmingpools! Even 2 pools were heated. Lagune with boat to the beach was nice.

title: Nice
comment: everything was quite good, had a great time! very warm sea, nice beach, animation team was always trying to entertain people, the hotel itself is a real 4star hotel, the rooms are big, nice staff

title: The best hotel we know
comment:
We have visit the Hotel two times and arrive next year again.
The most importen thing are that everyone who is working there, are the most good peopel we ever meet. Everybody is doing ther job exelent. The standard is in top, We love the cleanliness very good, every restaurant is in the top, clean and very good food.

title: Stay was too short
comment: I stayed at the hotel for only 2 nights.  The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was perfect with a nice variety.  Hope to return to the area soon and will definently try and stay here again.

title: Overnight stay in Amsterdam
comment: Just what we were looking for. The hotel had free parking and was near a subway station that brought you straight to the city center. So no worries about were to park. Clean and renewed room (you could still smell the new in the hall).

title: Amazing wellness facilities at Dorint an der Messe
comment: Dorint an der Messe Cologne is a very nice 4-star hotel. The spa and wellness facilities were better than we hoped we would get in a four-star hotel (compared to some five-star hotels we stayed in). The pool, jacuzzi and sauna were very clean and relaxing. The room (standard room) had all the comfort you need and the breakfast we had was excellent. The tables were clean and the staff was friendly and it wasn't over-crowded at all. If we plan another visit to Cologne, we would certainly stay at this hotel again.

title: Melia Grand Hermitage is just awesome
comment: Fantastic hotel- everything done to make your holiday perfect. We had a lovely stay there and be definitely back soon! Would highly recommend it! Food was delicious, as well..It is hard not to enjoy the great views down the beach from the exceptionally large private terrace assoiated with our suite.

title: Missed a flight in Frankfurt
comment: It was a great stay and all of my travel stress was gone before I left!The breakfast was one of a kind. Afterwards I relaxed in the Pool / Spa with sauna, steam bath and massage and tanning. Worked out in the gym for an hour with great views of the area and the airport. The only downside was too few business centers and one was closed.

title: Relax
comment: There is no much to say, it is my 7th year I am spending holidays in this hotel. I have spent a beautiful time in other expensive hotels throughout Europe, but definitely I found it is  not the number of stars which define feelings.  I am enjoying in my way.

title: Perfect
comment: i would like to thank all staff of the hotel for their good attitude to us and express special thanks to Balu and his animation team for their good mood,smiles,entertaintments, i have never laughed so much in my life is in their shous)

title: Good budget option on strip, bit rundown.
comment: I went with my father and we found a deal online that was too good to pass up.   I think the Luxor was a much better hotel 10 or 20 years ago, but it seems a bit run down now.   Still decent option though if you want to be on the strip for a good price.

title: A beautiful wellness-hotel
comment: Two days wellness and a wonderful massage. The hotel is nice and clean and the service is great! The restaurant is good, only for vegetarian there is too little choice. The sauna is a little bit small, there are only two of them, but clean and nice.

title: Dolphin
comment: Enjoyed this holiday so much we booked again for the following year and will be booking again for 2014,as returning guests we were given lots of extras.the food was supburb and catered for all different cultures and tastes.we had a cottage which was on the beach front which was very comfortable clean and spacious.the room boys took care of our every need.we still keep in touchwith the bar staff through sms.every one greets you with a smile and makes you feel special weather in feb was 35/40 degrees so all inclusive beer was welcome.would reccomend this hotel very higly.:)

title: Genuine country and people
comment: No words for this country and its people. If you really want a break from your current lifestyle, it's a genuine and peaceful destination. At the hotel, staff members were always smiling and helpful.

title: Its a good Hotel with nice rooms.
comment: We hade a bigger room with a place to relax and sit down. We really liked that. Service was good and friendly, the room was cleaned every day! The only thing we could eat at the hotel was breakfast, which in my opinion was a little bit expensive.

title: Perfect holidays with good food and friendly staff
comment:
We enjoyed very much. Food was very good, location of the hotel perfect, we enjoyed the leisure activities.

Sasha, Tyson, Kristina, Emeli, Denis...very friendly staff.

Thank you

JItka and Hana from CZech Republic

title: Great holiday in Dana Beach Resort
comment: it was my the best holiday.really everybody there are friendly and animation club was great  I thing that you can find there everything from fun to have a rest. I was only in castelo restaurat but there you can find all kind of food . super holiday

title: A very nice holiday with small faults
comment:
My wife and I were in these 2 weeks very well emotionally. The hotel we very nice, not too big nor too small. Some would have to change it, especially the rude staff that we noticed. Otherwise, they are all trying very, very, very friendly. The atmosphere is right, it's very cozy. Perhaps one should choose the audience something more international, mainly because there are very many Russians.
 We come back in any case!

title: Not one of the best choices on the strip
comment: This was one of the first few mega resorts on the strip in the 90's , but now it is really starting to show its age. The rates are rock low so you pay for what you get for. I stayed here as an invited guest and would probably not stay here if I had to pay.

title: Excellent vacationd & honeymoon
comment: IT was the best vacation I've ever had.... Everything was great, the kindness of the staff, the food was delicious..... smiling faces all around you.....  I had the most wonderfull time there, having fun all the time.... :)

title: Just average
comment: OK, so it's an airport hotel, just functional etc. We got bumped to a next-day flight (no frustration, though, so shouldn't affect my hotel assessment), stayed here, but the room was rather underwhelming. One bed with twin mattresses, nothing modern in the room, just everything very average. Restaurant downstairs was quite nice, though.

title: Beautiful honeymoon
comment: The hotel is easily one of the classiest establishments I have ever had the honor of staying at. The staff was extremely friendly, the layout was superb, the architecture was elegant, and the sea was literally a few steps from our hotel room. Beautiful views were only made more beautiful by this hotel's landscape, architecture, and friendly staff.

title: Very good hotel
comment:
hello. I have to say that in my 8 days that I've been. really good but could have had ot otherwise ok with 40 degrees and a nice breeze, we could well account for the pool. The rooms looked very good every day, your room completely done. and then there's the animation is very well organized for kids and for older people's show every night. and this girl elina I must thank you for this nice holiday In this great hotel
 marvin from holland

title: Great place for business and pleasure!
comment:
It was my first visit at the hotel and I have to say that I am very pleased with my experience. The service was excellent from the very beginning and the organization of the conference I attended was outstanding. The conference room was spacious and bright, timing was perfect, all the staff knowledgeable and professional! Being located on the beach and the comfort of the room made my stay that much more enjoyable and the transition from business to pleasure very easy. After hours of meetings being able to escape into the beauty of Golden Sands in a matter of minutes was something I really appreciated. I would highly recommend the hotel to all my friends and colleagues visiting the area.
Overall it was a great experience, one I would gladly repeat.

Wishing you a very prosperous New Year.

title: Average
comment:
1 the room was not clean. During our sray the cleaning was verry bad. Bathroom and sleeping floor not cleaned at all. Upon our complaint the reaction was: We only clean when very dirty!
2 Practically no storage space which is not very convenient.

title: All was good and i would come again to visit
comment:
everything was alright, by the way, i would come again, if i travel to egypt. the hotel manager is very friendly and helpfull. also the service of the staff, good work 
friendly greetz

title: Nice Affordable Hotel
comment: Great Price for Weekday stay. Weekends are little costlier. But on average, it is great. Pools are awesome. Nice dining options in the Hotel. Some construction was going on when we were there, little annoying but Ok.

title: Dana Beach is a top hotel!
comment:
In Dana beach is everything good, the food, the rooms, the people who are working there!!
We already went 14 times to this hotel and we already booked again for april 2013 for 2 weeks!
It's the best hotel in Hurghada for us!!!
Ilse And Danny from Belgium

title: All comfort Resort
comment:
A very nice Resort with 100% comfort. Clean, nice friendly polite people. All the services were great. After a long day trip to Luxor we still could have a dinner because it's possible until 24.00. The next day we used the late-breakfast. Superb.
Big variety of nationality and age.

title: Awesome resort and vacation
comment: Loved this holiday.  Wonderful people and wonderful place.  Couldn't ask for a better resort - the people are just amazing.  So wonderful to see people go to work smiling and leave work still smiling and happy.  They were there just to keep us happy.  A wonderful place to go and we are planning to return as soon as we can.  Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

title: Lovely hotel beside park but long walk to Trier
comment: The hotel was easy to find, had reasonably-priced parking and this was our main reason to choose it on our way home from a holiday in France. Its position beside Nells Park was lovely and our room was excellent with superb bathroom and shower. The decor of the dining rooms was very good but there was less choice of food and wine than we had expected. For us, the poor choice of German wines was disappointing. Unfortunately we speak very little German but the staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Value for money
comment: Food was excellent, I only missed good coffee ..I enjoyed especially home made pastry and cakes. Also "fitness " choice of food every evening was very good. The swimming pool for families with children and another one for a relax. The bikes which we could take for a short trip were in very bad conditions. I can recommend this hotel .

title: We were treated like royalty
comment: Very clean and tidy we went all inclusive all the guests were Russian apart from me been English and my partner Polish that was the 1st week and then a few German's arrived quite a few ignorant guests but most ok

title: Steigenberger Airport Hotel
comment: Staying here about 2-3 times a year, mostly business. This time stay was private, with entire family, incl child and Infant (3 rooms). All our requests were perfectly handled by saff. Staff is very capable; beds are super comfortable; breakfast buffett is awesome; airport shuttle service the moct convenient I have ever had.

title: Super hotel, perfect service, poor beach
comment: Everything perfect but the beach: too steep and dangerous waves (red flag), had to walk outside the hotel to have access. But we layed on the stretchers on the lawn with super service, so it was not so bad

title: Nice hotel for short stay - close to downtown
comment: Nice Hotel with decent size of rooms.  Small bathroom. Good service and friendly staff. Fitness room lacks equipment for basic weight training but offers state of the art cardio equipment. Overall the hotel can be recomended.

title: Nice hotel with a wonderful park
comment:
Next time we'll book a room on the parkside. Streetside is rather noisy in the morning.
Wellness offer and quality are very good. Diner was excellent and the choice at breakfast was good too.
Very friendly staff!

title: Excellent Hotel. Good situation. Friendly staff.
comment:
Excellent hotel. Friendly staff. Well located for access to town. Quiet location.
Were given a free room upgrade which made it even better!
Would stay again if revisiting the town.
No problems whatsoever.

title: Paradise on earth
comment: We felt us on our holiday like in paradise. The friendly welcome in the hotel, the generous size of the room, the cleanliness overal, the big size of the room and the bathroom was very great. The location and surrounding is very lovely arranged. We were very suprised over the staffs knowledge of foreign languages. The weather was every day fine, the beach was great. We liked the generous variety of food at the different restaurants. We would like to visit the Dana Beach Resort again. A great thank to the whole staff of Dana Beach. It was a great pleasure to be with you.

title: Hotel Golden 5 City Topaz Club
comment: I was there with a college 15 days ad Iwe like Topaz Club much more than Golden Five. The double rooms are perfect and very clean. The personal in the whole hotel let you feel that you are welcome en they treat you with care. The boys in the lobby bar (f.i. Mo) but also all the others were very friendly. My personel favourite is Gaber in the main restaurant as well as in the Italian rest. But as I said all the personal was very okay. One of the staff members speaks very good Dutch en Hussein M. the duty manager gave us a warm welcome and a very pleasant stay. Thank you all for that. The only thing we missed was snorkeling and a reef and a dutch channel on television. Miss you all

title: Best hotel
comment: I've been back to this hotel three times now as my experience each time was amazing, the rooms are clean and comfortable and the hotel considering its 20 years old is in amazing condition. It's located on the end of the strip but do not let that put you off! This hotel is awesome! And the pool has no shadows on it at all.

title: Dana Beach Resort
comment: Second time staying at Dana Beach Resort, there same time last year. Resort / rooms clean and tidy. Excellent selection of food, choice of restaurants and bars. Staff cannot do enough for you.

title: Very clean and fresh room!
comment:
This B&B was very clean and fresh. The owners maintained the place very well.
Beddings were warm and comfortable. Room was equipped with TV, radio, Kettle, Coffee maker, dvd player and a tv with so many channels. 
Ample towels and toiletries were provided which many other B&B don't usually provide enough.
Owners were very generous with the breakfast servings. Alphons was very helpful in helping us with directions in the area as well as places to visit.
The only little problem was to us since we don't travel light and the room is 2 floors up...

title: Always a nice stay
comment:
I think it is important to say that I returned to this location for at least 12 times. And I already booked my next stay for the end of this month (July 2011).

The hotel is great. Although it has more than 700 rooms, you can feel the good management watching the co-ordination between the working personnel in fulfilling the needs of the guests.

The cleanliness is very good, breakfast is great and abundant, staff is helpful and trying to do things as fast as possible.

The hotel has an underground garage very well secured.

title: Really nice hotel, quiet and confortable
comment: Hotel not too far from center (25 minutes walk from main station, but tram station just in front of the hotel), room really quite, beds really confortable. Great size room, incredible pool. Breakfast varied and excellent.

title: Wonderful Hotel, Clean Friendly very spacious
comment:
We Stayed at the Grand Hermitage for a week at the end of July start of August.  The rooms are huge. Its extremely clean, the staff are friendly.  We went all inclusive and there is a good selection for the buffet.
we got engaged while we there and the hotel talk care of everything, Flowers Champagne, they even set up a special room for us.    That evening we went for a meal at the al a carte restaurant.   The food there was incredible.  We had two course and a bottle of champagne and it cost us £31 WOW. Great hotel and I would recommend it to anyone.

title: An excellent place to stay with friendly hosts.
comment:
Alphons & Martha are excellent hosts, most accommodating & helpful finding our way and with use of their facilities over and above expectations, without being intrusive. Breakfast was super. This would be our first recommendation for a quiet stay close to the city! 

Gerrit & Connie

B.C. Canada

title: 8th stay
comment:
Big hotel area for nearby 300 guests.
Cleanless is very good in all the zones
All Iclusive serice
European people mostly english and german speaking, only few Russian and Polish, middle age.

title: Nice!
comment: I was there at first dayw of june with my wife ( weekend) and  and for more days again in Augoust with our chidren ( 18 , 15 years old). We all enjoyed , a lot! I hope to be there next summer for more days!

title: A basic experience
comment:
I arrived late at night. The receptionist was friendly and took all the trouble to help me.
I didn't go to the bar, but went directly to my bed and slept till 7.30 AM next morning.
hte bathing facilities were good. My breakfast was more than sufficient. I checked out. Again an very vriendly receptionist.

Thers is nothing more I can tell you. I didn't see much of the hotel or the facilities. I only went to bede there

title: Nice hotel, unpleasant stay.
comment: The hotel is close to everything Frankfurt has to offer. Unfortunately the staff is unable to cope with the standard of a five star hotel: my bill was full of errors and I had to discuss about it. There is no garage.

title: Nice hotel in the centre of Nes.
comment: Nice accomodation with a really great breakfast. It is really close to the centre of Nes and you are within minutes at the beach with the bike. The rooms were a lot smaller than expected and the bathroom had mold between some tiles, so that's why we rated that part lower.

title: Level Club at Melia
comment:
It's Michel and Pamela
We took the package of the honeymooners, and we spent one of the best holidays ever! Having the Level Member offer, we had several VIP services (free mini bar refilled, bottle of wine as a welcoming reception, VIP restaurant for breakfast, free lounge bar access (alcohol + sweets + tea/coffee/...), discount on several things (restaurant, laundry, shopping areas, clubs...) VIP area at the pool and in the garden, special SPA treatment and many other special services...
The service at the LEVEL lounge bar was amazing, there was a hostess named Anna, she was so friendly, smart, very elegant and treated us as VIPs. She deserves an excellent rating too..
Overall, all the stay was WOW, as we have amazing 8 days at a luxurious hotel.
We will surely visit it again next summer!

title: Grand, beau, plein de piscines
comment: Cet hotel est à conseiller pour ses piscines et les jeux aquatiques.  Très bel hotel mais la nourriture est le point faible même si on peut manger correctement mais simplement tous les jours.  ok

title: Bof
comment:
camping très bruyant même la nuit, les voisins se croient seuls sur le camping (parlent très fort), les sanitaires sont nettoyés à la va vite (très sales, résidus de savon et excrément sur les murs) une seule raclette à disposition pour douze douches. ne convient aux personnes voulant du calme.
aire de jeux pour les enfants très bien, piscine correct.
pour aller sur les commerces du camping, nous sommes obligés de sortir du camping, pas très sécurisant pour les enfants.
pas de point d'eau sur les emplacement, obligé de remplir un jerrican (pas pratique, pas digne d'un 4*)

title: J'ai passé un agréable séjour (Hôtel Titanic)
comment: c'est un hôtel convivial pour les familles ,le personnel et très aimable la chambre est  bien équipée , la piscine et superbe, la plage est à proximité de l’hôtel,il est accueillant pour les enfants , possibilité de sortir à proximité il a un  bon emplacement pour les excursions en plus

title: Camping Sympathique
comment:
J'ai séjourné cet été dans ce camping, et je peux vous dire que je n'ai rien regretté. Tout est fait pour que les enfants s'amusent bien, club enfants, animations au top, piscine et pantaglisse génial et surtout accueil chaleureux. Il est normal que dans un camping il y ai de l'ambiance au niveau des soirées, ça fait partit des vacances ou on est là pour en profiter et pour s'éclater. En tout qu'à, j'ai trouvé cela vraiment génial. 
Je reviendrais l'année prochaine
A conseiller.

title: Notre camping
comment: ca fait 2 années que nous venons dans ce camping assez agréable pour nous, sauf certains mobilhommes ou faut revoir les lits car mal de dos horribles sinon vu agréable vers l'entrée du camping au loin camping propre et personnel agréable et meme l'agent de sécurité de toute facon si nous revenons a la Ciotat c'est ce camping que nous choisirons pour la piscine et le toboggan c'était super mais manke de transat

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Merveilleux
comment:
Les yeux fermés je recommande à tous cet hôtel d'exception.

Les chambres sont vraiment parfaites, nous avons été agréablement surpris de la qualité de l'accueil, malgré un léger froid en arrivant ...

title: Inoubliable, De Vrai Vacances
comment: Même si la météo n'était pas forcément là, c'est un lieu que beaucoup aimerais fréquenter...calme, piscine hors gabarit et grand toboggan, des surveillants pour éviter les troubleurs de paix, des animations pour tous.... bref des vacances...des vacances...un lieu magique dans une pinède exceptionnelle...

title: Camping agréable
comment: Mobil home propre ´ bien équipé , dommage que les activités extra camping soient si chère pour une famille nombreuses, bien situé , proche centre ville et plage, restaurants en centre ville pas cher et très bon, supermarché discount tres proche du camping, toutes commodité , seul point noir le wifi payant et trop cher, pourtant borne gratuite en dehors du camping. Comptons revenir cette année. Équipe d animation très gentil, d'amis il est vrai que le parking extérieur trop petit en haute saison.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Déconseiller pour les jeunes !!
comment: animations et activiter médiocre , manque de sécuriter et  parmi ce manque de securiter un agent avec des réflexion trés oser et déplacer l’arrière du camping ouvert a tous on rentre comme on veut grillage détruit qui donne sur les bois , emplacement beaucoup trop sablonneux et pour couronner le tout un directeur aux comportement exécrable aucun tact, ni de sens des relations qui insulte les gens ouvertement et qui essaye de gratter de l'argent ou il peut  et ce n'est pas que mon simple avis ayant discuter avec beaucoup de personne dans le camping, bref camping que je déconseille fortement .

title: Réponse à Perdreau
comment:
Pour répondre à "perdreau", nous avons trouvé le camping fort agréable et bien équipé. Le directeur est allé voir nos bruyants et incivils voisins à notre demande (et celles d'autres) et a donc fait son travail....
Une piscine avec toboggans qui a fait le bonheur de nos enfants et une ambiance camping plutôt sympa!!le

title: Hôtel
comment: Très bon hotel, le personnel donne envie de revenir que ce soit seul ou accompagné, le personnel est souriant  et attentif. Je le recommande à n'importe quel couple ayant envie de se détendre et de passer un bon moment.

title: Super vacances!!!
comment:
Bonjour, 
Nous avons passés nos vacances l'été dernier dans ce camping et nous comptons bien y retourner cette année!!! 
nous sommes outrés par certains messages lus sur ce site, étant commerçants aussi, on sait ce que c'est! 
Quand les gens feront -ils part de leurs remarques constructives????
Le camping est agréable, le cadre magnifique, les animateurs sont formidables, on espère bien y revoir Aymeric et céline cette année!!!!

title: Dans l'ensemble pas trop mal !
comment:
Nous avons passe une dizaine de jours , l'an dernier au mois de juillet, il est vrais qu’il manque de la verdure! quand il y a des petit tourbillon de vent la poussière se trouve partout, pas très agréable quand on prend l’apéro,
les douches un peux petite, l'eau pas asse chaud pour se rasé,
A part sa le personnel est sympas, si non rien a dire,, que a par que on retourne cet été.
Adolph

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Titanic Beach
comment: Je tiens a felicite le manager du restaurant rose, rhones, il est tres honnete, sympathique. Car nous avons fait appel q lui apres avoir perdu un sac avec nos nouveaux achats, nous avons cherche longtemps et le manager nous a aide  en retrouvant ce sac et nous le rendant avec son contenu au complet> nous tenons a signaler que nous voyageons souvent et que ce genre de devotion et honnetete et tres rare> nous sommes seduit par l hotel et comptons revenir au noel prochain..    Je precise que je note ici seulement rhones et non tout le personnel.

title: Hotel Titanic Beach Spa & Aqua Park
comment:
Aux sujet des restaurants la qualitee est bonne le restaurant de la plage (restantent de poison) n est pas bon
Les autres sercice sont bien.
Toute fois un restantaurent ce detache des autres Le CAL est le plus calme, le plus serviable et la nouriture y est supperieur aux autres.

title: Le magnifique hôtel de la Croisette
comment: je trouve cette hôtel très bien  , il est très bien , a une très belle vus sur la mer , j'adore cette hôtel , il est bien exposer , sur la bai de cannes , il a tout pour plaire , c'est le plus connu de cannes

title: Pas top !
comment:
Très décu dès notre arrivée, avec un accueil qui gère les clients comme si c'était l'usine ! Camping 4 étoiles ou le restaurant ne sert pas de petit déjeuner, c'est limite quand même ! Le 1er jour problème de niveau de chlore dans le grand bassin, du coup personne se baignait ! 
Le surveillant de baignade était, les pieds sur la table, entrain de bouquiner ! Très efficace comme surveillance !!!

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Très bon hôtel avec des toboggans pour enfants
comment: seul probleme trop de RUSSES ! et la nourriture n'est pas au top mais par contre elle est bonne le boeuf est delicieux. il y a un restaurant reservé aux adultes donc sans enfants. hotel ALL INCLUSIVE. tous les jours une bouteille d'eau par personne dans le frigo + coca et sprite en plus des boissons a volonté partout dans l'hotel. beaucoup de piscine, parasols fixes = hyper importants sinon on se les fait prendre - piscines avec acces facilité pour enfant et handicapés. Personnel très serviable parle peu francais. Hotel a recommandé. De toutes les facons en Egypte il y a plein de Russes et ce n'est pas là qu'il faut aller pour bien manger PAR CONTRE LE BEAU TEMPS EST ASSURE . un plus EASYJET DESSERT l'egypte ! = baisse les prix !!!! super

title: Bon séjour
comment:
Dans l'ensemble nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce camping, 
Points positif: camping calme, mobil home bien équipé, animations sympas...
Points négatifs: petite piscine, ménage du mobil home fait "à la va vite", pièces petites, supérette assez cher.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Plus jamais
comment:
Camping NUL - Activités nulles et payantes même le concours de pétanques 4 euros
L'installation spectacle médiocre pas un coup de peinture (début juillet comment ce sera fin août ...) Mobil-homes entassés, on peut se serrer la main d'une location à l'autre Rentabilité + que ++
Des voitures partout, les enfants font du vélo et jouent sur ces allées
Superettes et boulangeries sur le petit parking extérieur
On a l'impression de naviguer en permanence entre les véhicules

title: Ne mérite pas 4 étoiles
comment: pédiluve de la piscine absolument immonde, mini-golf à l'abandon entouré d'un grillage défectueux et dangereux, tables de ping-pong sur le terrain de pétanque,mini-golf et terrain pétanque situés juste à coté des poubelles, installations avec murs nus en parpaing non peints, pas assez de parasol autour de la piscine, pas de parasol pour terrasse mobile home, aucune animation en juin( alors que de nombreux campings 3 étoiles en proposent), meme pas un pot d'accueil, personnel peu aimable à la réception, camping peu décoré; Point positif: la pinède dans laquelle le camping est placé. Pas suffisant pour le recommander.

title: Lamentable
comment:
Séjour du 06/07 au 20/07/2013 dans un mobil home 6/8 personnes. Le personnel de l'accueil est très désagréable, le directeur absolument abjecte.  
Les animations ne sont pas intéressantes, toujours la même musique, impossible de danser tellement on est serré. Une pseudo soirée mousse, il aurait fallu l'appeler soirée neige car il n'y avait que quelques flocons. La piscine est sale ainsi que les mobil homes. Vous devez vous levez à 7 heures du matin pour être sur d'avoir un transat au bord de la piscine. Notre mobil home a été infesté de fourmis, cafards et crapaud. Nous n'avons même pas le droit de nous plaindre si non le directeur vient vous voir en vous menaçant de faire appel à un avocat. Les animations enfants ne sont pas encadrées du tout. Séjour catastrophique.Ce camping ne mérite pas 4 étoiles. C'est une pompe à fric tout simplement.

title: Parfait pour un séjour en famille ou entre amis!
comment:
Nous sommes allés 2 années de suite à l'Estanquet et nous avons été ravis de nos séjours. Nous avons 2 enfants et ce camping est vraiment idéal pour eux: piscine chauffée, club enfant, terrain multisport, aire de jeu, tennis et golf! L'animation est vraiment sympa et l'accueil chaleureux. 
Les points négatifs: les incivilités et la mauvaise humeur de certains vacanciers!

title: LAMENTABLE !!!
comment: Attention si vous réservez dans ce camping même 45mn avant votre arrivée et en passant par un office de tourisme vous n'êtes pas certain d'y dormir. Vous trouverez à l'accueil un personnel particulièrement désagréable qui vous informera que vous n'êtes pas assez rapide dans les embouteillages et que vous êtes à la rue car ils ont donné votre location a quelqu'un d'autre sans même essayer de vous proposer une solution alternative.

title: Titanic Beach Spa & Aqua Park - Hurghada
comment: tres bon hotel , propre , grande chambre, bon temps , beaucoup des posibilites  dans l aqua parc , avec nombreuses tobogans l animation tres bonne avec une equipe magnifique avec de bons shows le service tres bien avec des staff tres amicaux je recommande cette hotel a tous le monde

title: De retour avec des très bons souvenirs ...
comment: Quand nous avons lu tous les commentaires négatifs avant de partir, nous appréhendions d'aller dans ce camping et nous avons eu peur d'avoir fait le mauvais choix ! Mais en fait, pas du tout... C'est un camping très agréable et nous en gardons de bons souvenirs ! Personnel très sympa, très bon accueil, l'emplacement du mobil home nous convenait tout à fait. Effectivement, il y a la nationale tout près mais franchement nous ne l'entendions pas ainsi que les trains, le camping n'est pas si bruyant que ça. Seul bémol, le port du caleçon ou short de bain à la piscine alors que dans le règlement intérieur, il est mentionné qu'il est strictement interdit mais ça les maîtres nageurs ne sanctionnent pas du tout, ce qui est bien dommage ! Bref, nous conseillons ce camping et la région qui est vraiment très très belle à découvrir !

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Camping sympa
comment: J'avais peur de partir car vue les commentaires négatifs mais bon !!!!Avons passé un très bon séjour dans ce camping avec une vue magnifique sur la mer.La dame de vacansoleil était très serviable et arrangeante.La piscine est un peu petite par rapport à la dimension du camping.Les sanitaires était souvent sale mais les vacanciers ne respecte rien (excrément sur les murs!!!)Mais tout ça ce sont les joies du camping .....Par contre la nuit un chien d'une villa aboyait pas cool.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Très très déçue
comment: Heureusement que nous n'avions réservé que pour une nuit.  Le train (TGV) passait juste derrière le mobil home (de 5 heures le matin à environ 23 heures le soir). Camping très bruyant, nombreux enfants et ado n'ayant pas le respect des autres campeurs. Mobil home sale. Apparemment, pas nettoyé depuis la dernière saison. Table pour manger dehors en très mauvais état et sale.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Très bon hôtel et très propre avec un aquapark
comment: tres bonne hotel proprete service,des piscines tres propres et le service impecable sauf de tres belles piscines et propre sauf que les piscines froides plages tres biens le restaurant tres propres mais avec les plats pas trop varies,l animation n est pas mal

title: Camping familial
comment:
Camping très bien pour un séjour en famille, bien qu'il soit trop éloigné de la plage et du centre ville. 
Animation très sympathique et adapté à tous les publics. 
Grâce à l'équipe qui entretient les sanitaires leur état de propreté est très convenable.
Malheureusement pour les familles ayant un bébé, les espaces réservés à ces derniers sont vétustes et inadaptés (pas de porte, eau froide, plan à langer inadapté...).
Parfois les nuits sont un peu bruyantes (ambiance camping!!), les matins sont très calmes.

title: NE VAUT PAS SES 4 ETOILES
comment: L'usine à touristes par excellence !! J'en revient et je ne suis pas prêt d'y retourner. L'acceuil pas terrible. Animation Bof ! le camping est plutôt vieillot, et le bar est sous une tente plastique. Il n'y a que la piscine qui relève le niveau. Enfin bref la liste est tellement longue que j'arrête là. Si vous avez encore le choix surtout n'y allez pas !!!!!

title: Titanic Beach
comment: Hotel immense, avec grande piscine et mer a proximite. Eau tres chaude et remplie de magnifiques poissons aux multiples couleurs. Animation durant toute la journee. Les Egyptiens sont tres sympatiques et aussi tres dragueurs. Mis a part sa, la nourriture est vraiment mangeable. Tres bons souvenirs!!!!!!!

title: Hôtel merveilleux
comment:
juste fabuleux merveeil
leux hotel de luxe mais juste avec ce kil faut on est bien on se sens heureuse meme si le  pirx des chambre est legerement exagerer tbon hotel a cpnseiller au gens ki reve de jolie chosesres

title: Plus jamais
comment: camping l'estanquet 2011  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!          rien à faire dans ce camping qui pourtant propose 4 etoiles !!!!!!!  emplacement mal conçu pour les vehicules  en location kiwi !!! toute un coté de ma voiture à refaire pour pouvoir entrer dans 2 m de large  !!! aucunes activité à proposer  pour des adultes , trés mauvais accueil , sanitaire à revoir ( fermer les yeux le pour y entrer !!! )  camping  à l'abandon  !!! le seul point positif le club enfant !!!  vacances dans ce camping du 9 au 23 juillet 2011  !!! plus jamais  !!!

title: Plus jamais
comment: camping pas terrible pour un 4 etoiles il ne les vaut pas sanitaires pas tres propres activites bof le personels pas acceuillant  emplacement la meme chose camping tros bruyant les soirees sont toujours les memes camping non une usine a fric tres decus plus jamais il me reverons   a fuir

title: Séjour agréable à part le Spa
comment:
Mise à part le sonna ou on nous a en fermé à clef, la chaleur devenait insupportable et pas moyen de prendre de l'eau pour en mettre sur les pierres chauffées, très dangereux pour les gens souffrant de problème cardiaque, on frappait à la porte pour qu'on nous ouvre personne ne répondait.
De plus le massage était en dessous de tout, pas professionnelle du tout.
En se qui concerne la nourriture il y a certainement un gros effort à apporter à l’amélioration des plats proposées en se qui concerne la variété et la qualité.
Pas d’eau proposé à table, c’est assez rare.
A part ça, tout était super!!! Et le directeur de l'hôtel est un homme qui se coupe en quatre pour le bien être de ces clients.

title: 100% satisfait
comment:
Hotel magnifique, soigné, spacieux, trés bien entretenue, jardins, plages, piscines,chambres, un rève .Handicapées bienvenue l'hotel est fait aussi pour eux, pas d'escalliers!!!!direct a la plage, GENIAL tout court
Personnel très serviables, suffit de les traités avec gentillesses, ils vous maitent a l'aise,  non agressifs comme dans d'autres pays étrangers!!!!!Direction a l'écoute des eventuelles plaintes, la nouriture ne me plaisaient pas, mais comme bon Belges nous sommes des gastronommes Nous  ne partons pas a l'étranger pour bien manger,
POUR: le repos, soleil, boire et se faire dorloter,vent et soleil; LE MEILLEUR HOTEL  
 Pas de bruits nocturnes!!!!!!!et bien gardér securité, est un service supplementaire que nous avons apprecier énormement
A FAIRE ALLEZ I

title: De très bonnes vacances
comment:
J'ai passé un séjour super dans ce camping. nous étions dans la haut du camping et à part un petit manque de pression de l'eau des sanitaires, c'était top.
Les enfants se sont éclatés dans les toboggans tout neufs et nous ont a fait de l'aquagym tous les jours. 
Le gérant et très sympa et accueillant. toujours un bon mot, un sourire...
pour les enfants c'est vraiment bien comme endroit : piscine, animations, club enfants et plage pas loin
on a aussi profiter de notre séjour la bas pour aller découvrir les calanques et la route des crêtes : juste magnifique.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: SUPER SEJOUR
comment:
Malgré une météo très capricieuse, nous avons passé un agéable séjour
le personnel est très sympa et à l'écoute des vacanciers
les animations sont tops
nous sommes familiers des vacances en camping et celui là nous le recommandons
bon rapport qualité prix

title: Parfait
comment: Apart le buffet  limite  je conceillerais cet hotel vivement  au geants qui on une petite base d'englais, le personel est super sympas du plus petit serveur  au plus grand manager. J'aimais vu un hotel avec autant de piscine .

title: Séjour hôtel Titanic
comment:
equipe animation  4 etoiles mais animateur francophone (alias zizo ) 5 etoiles. plus animateur mais ami et dams le respect des regles . suivait les instructions autoritaires a la lettre. ne voulait meme pas s assoir ni accepter un verre selon les consignes, respect total et merci a toi zizo. 
hotel chambre sans problemes. respect du client et toujours a ses demandes., nourriture 3 etoiles selon l estomac.

title: Hôtel Carlton
comment: Cet hôtel siteué dans le sud de la France plus précisément à canne est un hôtel 5etoile magnifique et les gens sont très serviables et polis les plat sont très travaillé et les suite comporte un sauna un salon pour recevoir des invités.

title: Titanic Beach Hurghada
comment: franchement un tres chouette hotel, la nouriture est excellente et les animations super. La piscine est propre mais un peu froide en hiver, l'hotel est grand et l'aquapark est genial. Les chambres sont tres agreable egalement.

title: Plus jamais
comment:
Nous avons passé le week end dans ce camping en toile de tente. Niché entre la départementale et la voie de chemin de fer. Inutile de dire que nous avons très peu dormi..Pas de papier toilette (que des dérouleurs vides) dans les wc pour un 4 étoiles c'est limite et des douches microscopiques sans lumière agrémentées d'un carrelage marron dont les joints sont moisis, ça donne pas envie !Par contre le sol est propre ainsi que le peu de toilettes ouverte en fin de saison.
En clair, une camping que je déconseillerai aux campeurs !!!

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Genial
comment: nous avons passé un superbe séjour au camping l'Estanquet ou l'animation étais au rendez vous. les toilettes sont propres les activités proposé sont diversifiés. nous avons été très bien accueilli par un personnel chaleureux et souriant rien a redire. le Mobil home étais tout équipe avec même une télé gratuite ( se qui est très rare dans les campings). nous avons pus aussi profiter de plein d’activités autour de la Palmyre ( marche, acro branche, luna parc, quad, petit train). nous avons aussi pus profiter de la piscine ouverte chauffée avec son toboggan et de piscine couverte a 200 metre du camping super calme. en bref  superbe séjour on retourne en mai et en août

title: ASSEZ DECUS DE CE CAMPING
comment:
Mobilhomes collés les uns aux autres avec emplacement pour voiture impossible pour nous. 
Bac de douche cassé, malgré l'intervention de Michel (technicien charmant) il était fort périlleux de prendre une douche.
Port du short de bain et poussettes autorisées à la piscine (donc pb d'hygiène), manque de transat (il faut arriver de bonne heure l'aprem)
Notre mobilhome était situé proche de la voix ferrée donc passage des trains régulièrement entre 5h et 23h
Animations très sympa à la piscine et au club enfant.
Personnel Homair très sympa.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Bon hôtel en général
comment:
Hotel agréable en général. Belles et nombreuses piscines.
2 points négatifs néanmoins, le personnel ne parle pas le français et les repas ne sont pas au top. On a eu droit de réserver une seule fois dans un des restaurants et je trouve cela bien dommage. Concernant les boissons alcoolisées même si vous êtes "en all in" pas de choix, il faut payer et c'est pas donner.
Sinon personnel très bien surtout celui du restaurant "Rose", très gentil avec les enfants.

title: Coup de foudre a l'estanquet
comment: Je reverai le camping un jour, mais pas cette fille, un soir, à l'air de jeu pour enfants... jolie femme au sourire magnifique, à qui j'ai évité de s'assoir sur un banc souillé ! si un jour tu me lis : tu m'as chamboulé belle demoiselle !

title: Qualité-prix excellent
comment:
Hôtel excellent au rapport prix/qualité.
Titanic Beach Resort et Titanic Palace forment ensemble un très grand hôtel. 
On peut utiliser les facilités des deux hôtels. Très grand aquapark (gratuit) Cuisine assez different, buffet restaurants thématiques (Chinois à recommander), resto Cal pour petit déjeuner et  diner tranquille (enfants interdits).Boissons 24h/24h (vins, coca-cola, limo, sprite, soda, de la bière, boissons alc locales, etc). Très bon entretien des piscines, chaque jour des essuie-mains propres. 
Chambres sont nettoyées chaque jour et prévus des essuie-mains propres. Minibar (eau, coca-cola et sprite)et safe dans la chambre. 
Balcon (sièges de terrasse disponibles).
Il y a des gens qui ne sont jamais content, en tout cas, pour nous c'était une vacance superbe,et de temps en temps, un peu de tolérance peut aider ...

title: Mes vacances d'automne
comment:
J`ai passe une semaine de vacances dans l`hotel Titanic beach a Hurghada. 
Le matin il y avait toujours un buffet pour le dejeuner avec croissants, crepes, petits pains, boissons,...
Toute la journee on pouvait aller a la piscine ou a la mer.

title: Bien situé
comment:
Hotel simpatique, bien situé au centre ville, proche de la gare.

Hotel moyennement isolé mais chambres spacieuses et propres; on s'y sent a l'aise.

Climatisation un peu bruyante la nuit, mais supportable dans l'ensemble.

title: Très correct
comment:
Hotel très correct pour une visite de la ville !!
A proximité de la vieille ville (5 min à pieds).
Hotel très bien placé dans la ville.
Point négatif : tarif des petits déjeuners (16€ par personne), il y'a meilleur compte de se rendre dans une boulangerie à proximité qui offre un très bon petit déjeuner complet pour 8/10€ par personne !!
La chambre reste petite mais pour le temps passé à l'intérieur ça suffit !!

title: Trés bonne animation
comment:
manque d'entretien extérieur des emplacements, mobilhome propre mais petit. la chambre des enfants ne permet pas de passer entre les deux lits!!
la présence de la ligne de chemin de fer n'ai pas dérangeante car peu bruyante. Très nombreuses animations de bonne qualité dommage que cela se termine à 23h le soir. Restaurant assez cher . Superette pratique mais chére ; pain et croissanterie tous les jours sans réservation.

hotel.name: La Baie des Anges (f. Les Oliviers)****

title: Un camping qui ne pense qu'à l'argent !
comment:
Si la situation du camping est bien, l'intérieur l'est tout au contraire ! 
Un petit bar qui devrait être refait ainsi que sa terrasse, le minigolf, les terrains de tennis, la table de ping pong. Inseré une douche à l'intérieur de la piscine de l'Estanque ne serait pas un luxe ! 
Un directeur très peu aimable qui ne pense qu'à soutirer des sous à ses clients. 
En ce qui concerne les saisonniers, si les surveillants de baignade et les femmes à l'accueil sont très sympathiques, les animatrices et les barmans le sont moins. 
Un camping qui manque de classe !
